Contents of text block. Supports markdow: I am an enthusiastic and detail-oriented Data Scientist with a deep passion for mathematics. As a Ph.D. student in the Genetic and Molecular Epidemiology (GAME) unit at Lund University, I've focused on applying novel statistical tools with the aim to optimize health data integration. I have participated in multidisciplinary teams in which I contributed to data analysis, research design, building dashboards, and project management.
